name: JC Ivancevich
bio:
I am a software engineer with over 7 years of experience in the IT Industry. During the latest years I have been working as a full stack developer building web and mobile applications. My specialities are Node.js, Angular.js, React.js and essentially all things JavaScript.
Also, I enjoy leading and managing teams and projects, as well as participating very actively in JavaScript communities and events in Buenos Aires and Latin America.
